name: Cheeky Armadillo
description:
Play with momentum and weight as you run and roll as a cheeky armadillo.

'Cheeky Armadillo' is a quick prototype made as part of a 1 game 1 week prototyping class, with the weeks theme of 'Physics Engine'. (an unfortunate theme, having never used a physics engine before this project)

I wanted to really get a feel for physical movement in a smooth satisfying way, hoping for a similar feel to tinywings. Honestly the game doesn't meet that yet, and level design leaves a lot to be desired, but it's a start.

As always, enjoy, and please share any feedback.
